questions.text: A test has been introduced that will detect a certain disease 1 year earlier than it is usually detected which of the following is likely to happen to the disease with in 10 years after test is introduced? options.label: A
options.text: It will be a good screening test

options.label: D
options.text: Apparent 5 year survival rate will increase

questions.correct_answer: D. Apparent 5 year survival rate will increase

questions.text: 6 prospective cohort studies were undertaken to examine the association between anti oxidant consumption & delivery of premature baby. options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: Minimum statistical significance is for study E

questions.correct_answer: C. Maximum statistical significance is for study F
